amendment.description: Making supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2016 to respond to Zika virus.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3898 withdrawn in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 3898 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 73.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3898 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 3898 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Nelson to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2733) Making supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2016 to respond to Zika virus.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3898 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 73.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3898 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Nelson to Amendment SA 3896.
